title: Iris
description: Egyptology student Iris Maddox has no time for love. But when she experiences strange visions during an excavation project, her life takes a drastic turn. Feeling confused and overworked, Iris travels to New York City to take a short break. While visiting her brother, she develops a mutual interest in his friend, John Hale.But there is someone else, too. During tough times, Iris has taken comfort in her colleague, Rob Marshall.Soon caught in a love triangle, Iris has tough decisions to make. But will the career-driven woman give in to love?
author: Billie Langford
